title: Jog
body: Move your legs at a quickened pace for 10 minutes to several hours.  Exercise can be done on any surface including treadmills and elipticals.

title: Swim
body: Enter the water and use a variety of techniques to swim back and forth in a swimming pool, or even in a lake or the ocean.

title: Bike
body: Choose the method on which you would like to exercise, whether it be a stationary bike, mountain or street bike, and pedal those legs for anywhere from several minutes to several hours.

title: Sprint
body: Similar to jogging except this should be done at such a speed so that only the balls of the feet are touching the ground.  Best done using intervals of merely only a few seconds to below 5 minutes.

title: Yoga
body: Strike a myriad of poses which are sustained for up to 30 seconds.  Chain the poses together for a better experience.
